title: Chicken and prawns
directions: Sprinkle the prawns and chicken with salt, pepper and cornflour. Rub them into the flesh with your fingers.
To make the sauce heat the oil in a large pan.
Add the onions and fry until soft.
Stir in all the remaining ingredients and bring to the boil.
Cook the sauce, stirring constantly until it thickens and becomes translucent.
Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.
Deep fry the chicken and prawns for 1 minute then remove from the oil and dry on kitchen towel.
Transfer the chicken and prawns to the sauce and cook on a moderate heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly
